name: The Wishing Well (vazor)
description:
Two lovers sit by a well. Each makes a wish and throws in a coin. Suddenly the girl falls in!

As the girl falls through the well, she approaches coins that have turned into wishes!

Can she find her lover's wish, and will it come true?

Producer: Jed Merrill

Audio: Kenneth Cobble (Proudly composed all within the time limit!)

Code: Jon Stephens, Josh Jones

This game was developed as part of Indie Speed Run 2015 (www.indiespeedrun.com).

This game was created during Utah Indie Game Jam 2015.
